locations.Fire Temple Flare Dancer Chest:
((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or not keysanity) and
                (can_use(Megaton_Hammer) or can_use(Hookshot) or (has_explosives and is_adult)) and (is_adult or can_groundjump)
locations.Fire Temple Boss Key Chest:
(((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or not keysanity) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer)) or
                (can_weirdshot and Hookshot) or
                (glitch_actor and can_use(Dins_Fire) and has_explosives and can_live_dmg(1.5))
locations.Fire Temple GS Boss Key Loop: ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or not keysanity) and (is_adult or can_use(Megaton_Hammer))
locations.Fairy Pot: has_bottle and (can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot) or can_mega or can_hover)

exits.Fire Temple Boss Room:
(is_adult or (can_mega or can_hover)) and
                (Boss_Key_Fire_Temple or (glitch_bk_skip_fire and can_hover and glitch_insane and can_use(Goron_Tunic)))

locations.Fire Temple Volvagia Heart:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and (can_use(Goron_Tunic) or
                (glitch_hard_bosses and Fairy and has_explosives))
locations.Volvagia:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and (can_use(Goron_Tunic) or
                (glitch_hard_bosses and Fairy and has_explosives))

locations.Fire Temple Map Chest:
((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 5) and can_use(Bow)) or
                at('Fire Temple Boulder Maze Upper', True)
locations.Fire Temple Boulder Maze Shortcut Chest:
at('Fire Temple Boulder Maze Upper', has_explosives) or
                (can_weirdshot and can_use(Hookshot))

locations.Fire Temple Highest Goron Chest:
(can_weirdshot and Hookshot) or can_use(Megaton_Hammer) or
                (can_play(Song_of_Time) and (can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_damage_boost))
